title: Ippadiye Lyrics Poojai Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Ippadiye
Singer(s): Rahul Nambiyar, Mili Nair
Music: Yuvan
Lyricist: Na.Muthukumar

Ippadye enga venaa
thookkikittu po.
enna inch inchaa
kaipidichu koottikittu po

Ippadiye enna konjam
ottikittu po
un idupula thaan
keychain-aa maattikittu po.

ena thottuputta unna naanum
vida maatten.
nee innum oru muththam
kettaa tharamaatten.

Adi podi raangi kaari
ninimey thaan dhoori dhoori.

Adadaaa maamankitta
mattikichu maynaa.
kudhira yeri vandhu
kootti poraaney.

Azhaga thavmirindhu
peththedutha ponnu
anbaa payapulla
thookki poraney.

nee yen usuru
yaarukkumey tharamaatten
ada enna vittu poga unna
vidamaaten.

Hey apple phone-a pola
kayyila edukkavaa
unn apppadiye touchu panni
ichu kodukkavaa.

hey facebook-il unna
follow pannavaa.
un status thaan therinjikkitu
like podavaa.

adadaa en manasu system aayidichu
adhula kadhal ennum virus
pugundhidichu.

market singam ippa
maarula saanjirichu
appadiye thoongidichu
aariraaro.

ye katterumba kadichiputten
vilamaaten.
naan kaalayila veyil adichum
ezhamaaten.

inivera jolli illa
idhupola jodi illa.

Adadaaa maamankitta
mattikichu maynaa.
kudhira yeri vandhu
kootti poraaney.

Azhaga thavmirindhu
peththedutha ponnu
anbaa payapulla
thookki poraney.

Aaalilaadha oora thaediporenda
anga unna mattum
kavalukku kootiporen da

Kaaththillaadha theevil vazhaporendi
naan moochu vida unna mattum
serthukuvendi.

pudhusaa porandhapadi manasu
ippa kudihikkudhadaa.
mulusaa thirudi enna
medhuva anachikoda.

market vandha ponna
manasula vandhu ninnu
mayangi vilundhudichu
naanthaan paavi.

seo.title: Ippadiye Lyrics Poojai Song Lyrics
seo.description: Get the complete Ippadiye Lyrics Poojai Song Lyrics from Poojai. Read the lyrics penned by Na Muthukumar and sung by Mili Nair. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Na Muthukumar, Poojai, Mili Nair, Rahul Nambiar, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
